title: This is fucking ridiculous, why does Lyte even have a job?
body:
I'm sick of getting trolls in 1/3 games at Diamond.

People are rage quitting if they die early and intentionally losing games because someone argued with them, left and right. This is retarded. Absolutely nothing has been done to deter this behavior, which should result in an immediate ban in ranked, especially at this rating.

I'm struggling to understand why the fuck he hasn't been replaced with someone who will actually do something positive for the game.
What credentials do I need to sit around, do nothing, and collect a pay cheque?

replies.body: This right here is why so few Rioters want to interact with the community.  You should be ashamed of yourself.

> [{quoted}](name=redniwediS,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=NOneAIFK,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-01T07:17:47.532+0000)
>
> This right here is why so few Rioters want to interact with the community.  You should be ashamed of yourself.

\> Implying Lyte has ever responded to or even acknowledged this problem in the past 2 years of being asked to deal with it.

No, I shouldn't be ashamed of myself. Two fucking years with zero communication on this topic, which as far as I can tell, it's supposed to be his job to deal with.

No, he is correct. If you wish to be heard then you must be respectful and mature in your complaints. You sir, were not. 

While trolls and children run rampant in both ranked and normal play these are things that cannot be stopped preemptively. These people get banned or punished BECAUSE you see it in game. Try to take solace in the fact that if we had no system in place you would have had 1/2 of your games as you described instead of 1/3.

To add as well, it only takes one troll to ruin a game. While it may seem like one is *surrounded* by trolls and AFK's that are 'everywhere' it's actually not a large percentage of people, assuming you don't count the people who go tilt after the first guy.

Agreeing with this.

Yes, the state of the game is quite awful.  Yes, there is at least some toxicity in 70% of games.  Yes, it feels like no one we report ever gets banned.
No, insulting the people who are supposed to be working on the problem won't solve anything.
In case you get voted down: I agree with you.

Here's the thing: they aren't banned. These people behave like this constantly and repeatedly. They have to do it dozens of times before they get a slap on the wrist, if at all. Doing it once should get them banned.

I've said it before. Trolling one game of ranked should result in a ban from ranked for the rest of the season and ineligibility for ranked rewards. Trolling a second time results in an immediate permaban.
While I agree on the fact punishments should be harsh but this is just too extreme.

Two years..? LOL. All MOBAs suffer from trolls from day 1. Just because there isn't a meta or a huge community at day 1 that can help dictate what's trolling and what's not doesn't mean it didn't happen. This game has existed for a long time now and will continue to and it will always have people who troll. If you don't like it, go play another MOBA and see how their community is. Even Smite has trolls, excluding TSM (Shots fired!). lol.
